  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_107386</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_107386</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Refraction of light</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brechung des Lichtes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réfraction de lumière</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Refraction da luz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rifrazione di luce</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάθλαση του φωτός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Refracción de la luz</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These ray diagrams show the refraction of light as it passes an air-glass interface at an angle less than ninety degrees (left) and at ninety degrees (right).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">angle of incidence</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">angle of refraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">incident ray</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">interface</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ray diagram</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">refracted ray</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">refraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Strahldiagramme zeigen die Brechung des 
Lichtes, während sie eine Luft-Glas Schnittstelle schräg weniger als
neunzig Grad (nach links) und bei neunzig Grad führt (recht).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces diagrammes de rayon montrent la réfraction 
de la lumière pendant qu'elle passe à une interface d'air-verre sous
un angle moins de quatre-vingt-dix degrés (à gauche) et à 
quatre-vingt-dix degrés (de droit).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estes diagramas do raio mostram o refraction da 
luz enquanto passa a uma relação do ar-vidro em um ângulo mais 
menos de ninety graus (à esquerda) e em ninety graus (direito).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questi schemi del raggio mostrano la rifrazione 
di luce mentre passa ad un'interfaccia del aria-vetro ad angolo meno 
di novanta gradi (a sinistra) e (di destra) a novanta gradi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτά τα διαγράμματα ακτίνων εμφανίζουν τη διάθλαση 
του φωτός καθώς περνά μια διαπροσωπεία αέρας-γυαλιού διαγωνίως 
λιγότερο από ενενήντα βαθμοί (αριστερά) και σε ενενήντα βαθμούς
(δεξιά).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estos diagramas del rayo muestran la refracción 
de la luz mientras que pasa un interfaz del aire-cristal en ángulo 
menos de noventa grados (a la izquierda) y en noventa grados (de 
derecho).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einfallswinkel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brechungswinkel</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
